bropals.lib.simplegame.entity.block

Class BlockEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • bropals.lib.simplegame.entity.BaseEntity
      • bropals.lib.simplegame.entity.block.BlockEntity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TexturedBlock

    public class BlockEntity
extends BaseEntity
    A simple rectangular entity.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • BlockEntity

        public BlockEntity(GameWorld parent,
                   float x,
                   float y,
                   float width,
                   float height,
                   boolean anchored)
        Create a new collidable BlockEntity with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent of the BlockEntity
        x - The x position of the BlockEntity
        y - The y position of the BlockEntity
        width - The width of the BlockEntity
        height - The height of the BlockEntity
        anchored - Whether or not this BlockEntity object can move or not.

        public void update()

        Updates this entity. Meant to be overridden and implemented in a subclass.

        update in class BaseEntity

      • collideWith

        public void collideWith(BlockEntity other)
        A method that is called when this block collides with another block. This is called after the position is fixed, but before this block stops moving.
        Parameters:
        other - The other block that this block collided with

      • containsPoint

        Checks to see if the given point is inside this Block Entity.
        Parameters:
        x - the x position of the point
        y - the y position of the point
        Returns:
        whether or not it contains the point
